5 POKE53781,6:POKE53280,14
7 PRINT"(CLR)(WHT)"
10 FOR I=8192 To 8292
20 READ A:POKE I,A:C=C+A
30 NEXT
35 IF C<>12093 THEN PRINT"ERRORE NET DATA !!!":END
40 SYS 8192
50 PRINT"BORDO DISATTIVATO !!!"
100 DATA120,169,46,141,20,3,169,32,141,21,3,169,0,141,255,63
105 DATA173,26,208,9,129,141,26,208,173,17,208,41,127,141,17,208

120 DATA2,41,1,208,16,169,248,141,18,208,169,8,13,17,208,141
125 DATA17,208,76,188,254,169,0,141,18,208,169,247,45,17,208,141
130 DATA17,208,76,188,254
